infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `Properties.KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to a customer managed key id

remediation.cloudformation: Set `Properties.KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to a customer managed key id
remediation.terraform: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

iacDescription.issue: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
iacDescription.impact: Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies
iacDescription.resolve: Set `Properties.KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to a customer managed key id

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Non-encrypted RDS instance at rest
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The DB instance storage is not encrypted by default
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

iacDescription.issue: The DB instance storage is not encrypted by default
iacDescription.impact: Should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: RDS automatic backup is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Automatic backup of AWS Relational Database is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: No automatic backups will occur, availability risk if disaster occurs and manual backups have not been set

iacDescription.issue: Automatic backup of AWS Relational Database is disabled
iacDescription.impact: No automatic backups will occur, availability risk if disaster occurs and manual backups have not been set

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: IAM authentication for RDS cluster is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: IAM authentication for RDS cluster is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: IAM integration allows you to avoid using passwords in favour of short lived tokens.

iacDescription.issue: IAM authentication for RDS cluster is disabled
iacDescription.impact: IAM integration allows you to avoid using passwords in favour of short lived tokens.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: RDS IAM authentication is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: IAM database authentication is disabled, authentication tokens are not used to connect to DB instance
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Users will connect to DB instance with password, which are less secure than temporary tokens which expire

iacDescription.issue: IAM database authentication is disabled, authentication tokens are not used to connect to DB instance
iacDescription.impact: Users will connect to DB instance with password, which are less secure than temporary tokens which expire

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: RDS cluster does not have encryption enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: RDS cluster does not have encryption enabled which means data is stored on cluster in plaintext
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: In the occurrence of a data breach, sensitive data stored on the RDS cluster will be accessible

iacDescription.issue: RDS cluster does not have encryption enabled which means data is stored on cluster in plaintext
iacDescription.impact: In the occurrence of a data breach, sensitive data stored on the RDS cluster will be accessible

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Non-Encrypted SNS Topic
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to KMS key for example `alias/aws/sns`

remediation.cloudformation: Set `KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to KMS key for example `alias/aws/sns`

iacDescription.issue: The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest
iacDescription.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
iacDescription.resolve: Set `KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to KMS key for example `alias/aws/sns`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The DB instance storage is not encrypted by default
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

iacDescription.issue: The DB instance storage is not encrypted by default
